data.title: How to Watch TWiT Podcasts on Windows or MacOS
data.meta_description: You can watch or listen to any of our podcasts on your laptop or desktop computer. The options listed below are just some of the many ways to watch or listen to TWiT.
data.text:
You can watch or listen to any of our podcasts on your laptop or desktop computer. The options listed below are just some of the many ways to watch or listen to TWiT.

Windows

The TWiT.tv website allows you to view the latest episodes as well as all previous episodes of any TWiT show.

VLC Media Player can subscribe to podcasts as well as play nearly any video format.

Pocket Casts Plus features a desktop app that works on Windows.

Using the Spotify web player, you can listen to podcasts in your browser.

iTunes for Windows allows for subscribing to audio or video feeds of all TWiT podcasts.

MacOS

The TWiT.tv website allows you to view the latest episodes as well as all previous episodes of any TWiT show.

Apple Podcasts (in macOS, formerly known as iTunes) allows for subscribing to audio or video feeds of all TWiT podcasts.

Pocket Casts Plus features a desktop app that works on macOS.

Using the Spotify web player, you can listen to podcasts in your browser.

Note: The Apple TV Mac app does not support viewing podcasts.

Linux

The TWiT.tv website allows you to view the latest episodes as well as all previous episodes of any TWiT show.

Podcast apps:

VLC Media Player is likely already installed as your media player of choice, but it can also subscribe to podcasts.

gPodder is a simple, open source podcast client written in Python using GTK+.

Vocal is designed specifically for elementary OS Freya and available for all other Linux distributions.

CPod is an open source podcast app.

Smart Speakers

Although not technically "computers", you can listen to TWiT podcasts on several brands of smart speakers.

Amazon Alexa

You can hear full episodes by saying, "Alexa, play [NAME OF TWiT PODCAST] on TuneIn."

You can also install the TWiT Flash Briefing skill and get short clips from various TWiT podcasts in your daily Flash Briefing news. The skill is available in the US, Canada, UK, Australia, and India.

Google
